alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 1:02AM MDT until June 24 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 202 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Etbauer Hill, or 18 miles east of Fort Thompson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gann Valley around 205 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
